title: Honors Physics I
description: Parallels introductory Physics I (PHYS 2211). Some topics treated in more depth or more extensively. A rigorous physics foundation requiring demonstrated competence in mathematics.

__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 1502 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1512 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
